title: Did Bayden, Ossov, and Warnock make a mistake in promising people " $2,000 as cheques '?
subtitle: The fact that $600 plus $1,400 is worth $2,000 is relevant here.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: In late December 2020 and early January 2021, President-elect Joe Biden and Georgia, running for the Senate, John Osov, Rafael Warnock, misled the public by claiming that winning both races in Georgia would allow for the immediate passage of $2,000 COVID-19 relief checks.
